name: Soar ((Galina) Jialin Zhu)
description:
Premise:

 The beginning of life is not necessarily very smooth, maybe it is dark and cannot be seen clearly. Keep going up even if you can't see the light. Don't look back, don't think so far into the future, we just need to work hard and keep going. Even if persistence is painful, persistence is also attractive. When we walk on the road we like, we can find the beauty of persistence even if there are thorns everywhere.

Control:

WASD(or arrow)  to move,

Space to jump,

ESC to quit.

This game is created for the ArtCenter College of Design’s 2022 Spring Game Jam. 

Game developers:

Coding: Jason Jiang

Visual Art: Galina Zhu

Game Combination: Jason Jiang

Audio Reference: Galina Zhu

Game Thoughts: Jason Jiang, Galina Zhu
